Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model

Interface GameObserver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardScreen, CLIBoardScreen, CLIConnectionErrorScreen, CLIConnectionScreen, CLIGodSelectionScreen, CLIMenuScreen, CLIPickGodScreen, CLIWinnerScreen, ConnectionErrorScreen, ConnectionScreen, CreditsScreen, GodSelectionScreen, GUIBoard, GUIConnection, GUIConnectionError, GUICredits, GUIGodSelection, GUIMenu, GUIPickGod, GUIWinner, MenuScreen, PickGodScreen, RemoteView, Screen, WinnerScreen
    public interface GameObserver
extends Observer
    This interface defines the methods implemented from all views to states change in the Game model

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void receiveAllowedSquares​(java.util.List<Coordinate> allowedTiles)
      Send allowed squares for placing builders
      void receiveAvailableGodList​(java.util.List<God> gods)
      Notifies all player of the list of all gods
      void receiveBoard​(Board board)
      Receive the current status of the board
      void receiveBuildersPositions​(java.util.List<Builder> builders)
      Send to observer a list with all builder objects in game
      void receiveDisconnect()
      Notifies all observers that a client has disconnected
      void receiveGameState​(Game.State state, Player activePlayerName)
      Notifies the GameObservers of the change of the GameState, send the state to the observers
      void receivePlayerList​(java.util.List<Player> list)
      Notifies all players of the updated player list status, containing also information about Gods and Builder positions
      void receiveUpdateDone()
      Notifies all observers that the update is done, and they could safely display the content

    • Method Detail

      • receiveGameState

        void receiveGameState​(Game.State state,
                      Player activePlayerName)
        Notifies the GameObservers of the change of the GameState, send the state to the observers
        Parameters:
        state - A Game.State enum type, identifies the new state of the Game
        activePlayerName - Contains the active player name, this player will be the next player to do an action

      • receivePlayerList

        void receivePlayerList​(java.util.List<Player> list)
        Notifies all players of the updated player list status, containing also information about Gods and Builder positions
        Parameters:
        list - A map with keys all player names and values the name of the god pick from other players, if the player has not picked a god the value will be null

      • receiveAllowedSquares

        void receiveAllowedSquares​(java.util.List<Coordinate> allowedTiles)
        Send allowed squares for placing builders
        Parameters:
        allowedTiles - The squares where the builder could make his action

      • receiveAvailableGodList

        void receiveAvailableGodList​(java.util.List<God> gods)
        Notifies all player of the list of all gods
        Parameters:
        gods - A list of all gods available in this game

      • receiveBuildersPositions

        void receiveBuildersPositions​(java.util.List<Builder> builders)
        Send to observer a list with all builder objects in game
        Parameters:
        builders - The list of builders

      • receiveBoard

        void receiveBoard​(Board board)
        Receive the current status of the board
        Parameters:
        board - The board object

      • receiveUpdateDone

        void receiveUpdateDone()
        Notifies all observers that the update is done, and they could safely display the content

      • receiveDisconnect

        void receiveDisconnect()
        Notifies all observers that a client has disconnected
